title: mythicmobs 刷出来的变成骷髅
author: mm1030995765
txt_content:
后台显示:[19:27:58 ERROR]: [MythicMobs] Could not load MythicMob yl! Invalid type specified.[19:27:58 WARN]: [MythicMobs] Error enabling spawner 'mozhu1' - MobType 'xuemozhu' is invalid! Spawner cannot initialize. Disabling.
[19:27:58 ERROR]: [MythicMobs] Error loading MythicSpawner mozhu1: enable debugging for stacktrace.


自定义怪物变成骷髅,名字变成:Error mob type for 'yl' is invalid

配置文件:
yl:
  Mobtype: wolf
  Display: '&blv.8&e妖狼'
  Health: 1350
  Damage: 14
  Drops:
  - lm 1 0.7
  - exp 3
  Options:
    PreventOtherDrops: true
    MovementSpeed: 

求救~~~~~~~~~

replies.author: qsefthuopq
replies.txt_content:
这个配置应该没有问题
报错的是其他配置
mozhu1刷怪笼出错
怪物类型xuemozhu无效

replies.author: mm1030995765
replies.txt_content: 刷怪笼那个忘记删掉了，就是那个mm插件刷出的这个狼都是骷髅而且名字报错，只有20血量，其他的都是正常的

replies.author: qsefthuopq
replies.txt_content:
可能是血量超过服务器默认设置的血量上限
在spigot.yml内将
  attribute:
    maxHealth:
      max: 8888.0复制代码
血量上限调大然后重启服务器

replies.author: mm1030995765
replies.txt_content: 血量上限我设置两百万的

replies.author: mm1030995765
replies.txt_content: 还有人能解决这个问题吗

replies.author: mm1030995765
replies.txt_content: 自定义怪物变成骷髅,名字变成:Error mob type for 'yl' is invalid

replies.author: qsefthuopq
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 qsefthuopq 于 2018-5-14 20:35 编辑 

你设置的 
   MovementSpeed:  
数值是不是空的还有把Mobtype改成Type试试

replies.author: mm1030995765
replies.txt_content: 不用了，我自己弄好了，是重复了
